backend/main.mo: Defines resident-related data types, authorization mixin usage, and in-memory maps for residents, user profiles, and health records with access checks and resident management entrypoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs associated with resident profile edit functionality and update flows.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for numerous frontend files including routing, UI components, hooks, utilities, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH color tokens, dark mode overrides, and shared component styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point setting the app title and loading the React main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router and React Query, wraps the app with authentication and toast providers, and defines core routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication gate that shows a branded login screen when unauthenticated and renders children when identity is present.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Application shell providing header, navigation, main outlet, and footer with sign‑out logic that clears identity and cached data.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Simple navigation bar rendering a single Dashboard link with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Dialog component for creating a new resident with form state, nested field handlers, validation, and submission via useCreateResident.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Dialog for adding an ADL record with validation, identity checks, and submission via useCreateAdlRecord.
Displays a resident’s ADL record history with sorting, deletion, and loading/empty states.
Re-exports ADL dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing resident information, managing form state, validation, physician list updates, and saving changes.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Dialog for creating MAR records, validating inputs, and submitting medication administration data.
Re-exports MAR dialog and history list components.
Shows a resident’s MAR history with formatted dates, sorting, and record deletion.
Dialog for adding a new medication with fields for dosage, route, times, prescriber, and notes.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays resident summary info with actions to view, toggle status, and delete, including a confirmation dialog.
Header section for the resident dashboard with title and an add-resident button.
Provides room-based filtering and sorting controls for resident lists.
Renders a grid of ResidentCards or an empty-state message when no residents match filters.
Displays KPI cards showing total, active, and discharged resident counts.
Tabs for filtering residents by status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for recording daily vitals, validating fields, converting units, and submitting a vitals entry.
Displays a resident's vitals history, supports deletion, sorting, and status indicators for oxygen levels.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Shows a placeholder card listing missing reference materials and links to a reference checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Provides scoped React Query keys for resident-related queries using the user's principal ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, identity loading, and session state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profiles, residents, and vitals using the authenticated backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, light/dark theme variables, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports static branding data including the facility name and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind and clsx class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page fetching residents, applying filters/sorting, computing KPIs, and rendering grid and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data for residents, with a special case for resident ID 3.
Defines resident profile and medication types and returns fallback mock profile data.
Contains mock resident list data used for testing or UI previews.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Transforms backend resident records into UI view models including age and room formatting.
Utility functions for filtering, sorting, KPI calculation, and unique room extraction for resident lists.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Resident profile page loading backend or mock data, managing vitals/MAR/ADL dialogs, and supporting edits and printing.
Generates a printable resident profile report with demographics, insurance, and medication tables.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: Reference checklist page outlining screenshots and design assets needed for UI recreation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash query parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the hash without reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins including container queries and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, versions, and a list of implemented features with metadata for the Maui Lane Care Home app.
